title: Update Hero profile photo to provided URL

requirements.text: Update the profile photo displayed in the Hero section to use this exact image URL as the src: https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQG_vKIcM3o7oQ/profile-displayphoto-scale_200_200/B4DZw8fRO0HwAY-/0/1770541359476?e=1772064000&v=beta&t=LliVE_e8O6KDOE8oCWLvaWL8Vnm5WhGNfogpC7gsdaU
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section profile image loads from the provided LinkedIn URL and visually replaces the previous photo.
No other Hero content (name, title, summary, CTA buttons) changes as part of this update.
The profile image remains circular (rounded-full) and keeps its existing sizing and border styling.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add backend functionality or persist profile images in the canister.
Do not change the overall site theme, layout, or other CV section content beyond updating the Hero profile photo source.
